resources.string: Start calculating your discount now! Enter the starting price and discount amount to find the final price.

This app is a simple discount calculator that allows users to calculate the final price of a product after a discount has been applied. The user can enter the initial price of the of the product as well as select a predefined discount (25%, 50%, or 75%) or enter a custom discount. The application will calculate the final price of the based on the user input and display the result. 

In addition, application also provides notifications if there are errors in the user's input such as such as empty starting price or invalid discount format. With a simple and easy-to-use interface, this application is suitable used to assist users in calculating product prices with discounts quickly and efficiently. 

This application is made for Assessment 1 
Mobpro 1.

There is no settings feature yet.
